Title: Creating a user account when the User Name text box is not filled in

Steps.1: Log in as an Administrator: User Name: TestAdmin; Password: Password1@
Steps.3: Click on the Account Administration tab
Steps.4: Click on the Create Account button
Steps.5: Leave the User Name text box empty
Steps.6: Enter data Password123@ in Password text box
Steps.7: Enter the data Password123@ in the * Confirm Passwordtext box
Steps.8: Click on the Sign Up button

Expected Result: A warning window popped up with the message:  'Please enter the user name'
